name: Princess Edge - Dragonstone
description: Princess' Edge - Dragonstone is a beat'em up inspired by Golden Axe, however unlike the usual beatemup it use the 3 planes system similar to Guardian Heroes. Ride your dragon & unleash powerful magics upon your enemies to restore the peace to the land!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 80 MB available space
